entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
